title: Core Capability for Chemistry
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: Between 21 July and the end of October 2014, over a dozen papers were published that reported measurements performed with the equipment provided by this grant. By its very nature, the equipment is available as a service to many users inside and outside the department. This fact complicates the creation of a consistent system for grant acknowledgement, but we are confident that this can be implemented. Chemicals,Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology Economic
findingsText:
The research that was made possible through the core capability grant has hugely increased our ability to carry out rapid analysis of chemical compounds and materials. Our earlier research has resulted in many patents and spin-outs.
We expect the same longer-term impact of the current grant. Chemicals,Energy,Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology
